Description: Check if all required ingredients are available
Success Outcome: All ingredients are ready for sandwich preparation

Description: Go to the nearest store to purchase missing ingredients
Decision: Were you able to purchase all missing ingredients?
Success Outcome: All ingredients acquired and ready for sandwich preparation
Validation Rules: Ensure store has fresh produce section
Retry Logic: Try different store if first attempt fails

Description: Examine bread to ensure it's fresh
Decision: Is the bread fresh and without mold?
Success Outcome: Bread is suitable for sandwich making
Validation Rules: Visual inspection and smell test; bread should be soft without discoloration

Description: Get new bread from pantry or store
Validation Rules: Verify bread is within expiration date
Retry Logic: Check other types of bread as alternative

Validation Rules: Even coverage on bread; appropriate amount without saturation

Description: Layer cheese lettuce and tomato on bread
Failure Outcome: Ingredients poorly arranged or falling out
Validation Rules: Cheese should touch bread; lettuce provides barrier between bread and tomatoes
Ensure even distribution and proper layering

Description: Place top slice of bread and press gently
Validation Rules: Bread aligns properly with even pressure applied
Retry Logic: Try once more with gentler pressure

Validation Rules: Check for protruding ingredients; ensure even distribution

Description: Cut sandwich diagonally or straight across
Decision: Is the cut clean and even?
Failure Outcome: Cut is uneven or sandwich structure compromised
Validation Rules: Use sharp knife and moderate pressure

Description: Realign the sandwich and make a new cut
Validation Rules: Use sawing motion rather than pressing

Description: Place sandwich on plate with presentation
Validation Rules: Centered on plate with any extras (chips/pickle) arranged neatly
Ensure clean plate edges; consider garnish

Description: Discard current attempt and restart process
Validation Rules: Evaluate cost/benefit of starting over vs. serving imperfect sandwich
